org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.audio

Class SpeechDetectorTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.demos.sandbox.audio.SpeechDetectorTrainer

  • public class SpeechDetectorTrainer
extends Object
    A trainer for the speech detector. Uses MFCCs to train a KNN classifier.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
